short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for better rendering of code blocks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you read technical articles in other languages, you may want to use Chrome's default translator. But sometimes it will also translate blocks of code on the web page.

The keywords, variable names in the code blocks will be changed (to the target language), and sometimes the layout will be broken.

This extension will prevent Chrome from translating blocks of code on the web page, making for better code reading in that case. In addition, the extension also includes other related features.
